Mufarriḥ al-nafs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ibn al-Marah, Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar.

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The author's name appears as ابن المره in title page (f. 1r) and ابن المراه at the beginning of the book (f. 1v).
Ownership statement on fragment 1 signed David G. Lyon dated December 1911.
Written in one column, 22 lines per page, in black and red.
Cream laid paper. 19.6 x 14.1 cm. (14-15 x 9-9.7 cm.).
Bound in dark brown leather ; rebacked with red leather.
MS Arab SM211. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Medicine, Arab
Senses and sensation
